prompt: On the website, find the sentence that explains why it might be bad to change a Doberman’s diet suddenly, and paste it in the answer space. Be sure to copy and paste the exact, full sentence.
description: Visit the Doberman Pinscher Society website.
feedback: One of the main items on the menu is “Caring for Dobermans.” Since feeding is part of dog care, that’s a good place to look for information on a Doberman’s diet. When you click the “Caring for Dobermans” link, there is a section on feeding your Doberman. In that section, you’ll find the explanation for why you shouldn’t suddenly change your Doberman’s diet: “You shouldn’t change a Doberman’s diet suddenly, or your dog may get an upset stomach and other problems.”
